# Welcome! {.unnumbered}

Welcome to the workshop Introduction to Bash and essential HPC skills that is developed by [Lukas van de Wiel](https://www.uu.nl/staff/LYvandeWiel) and [Jelle Treep](https://www.uu.nl/staff/HJTreep). The workshop is part of the [HPC Spring School @ UU](https://utrechtuniversity.github.io/hpc-spring-school/) organized by the [UDCC](https://www.uu.nl/en/research/digital-competence-center).

The contents of this workshop are for a large part based on material of the workshop '[The Unix Shell](https://swcarpentry.github.io/shell-novice/index.html)' developed by the [Software Carpentries](https://software-carpentry.org/) and published under [CC BY 4.0](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/) license.
